data.text: Something you absolutely don’t need to carry with you in Florida? Your vaccine card. Not one person has asked to see it. No one cares here.

#fascism
Anyone else notice that the people who say “I don’t need the vaccine cause I don’t go anywhere” also ate out last week at a busy restaurant and are planning a trip to Florida next week?
I heard if you’re a nurse in Florida you’ll get fired for having the COVID vaccine.

Fact

Florida & South Dakota didn’t shutdown
Children stayed in School
Businesses stayed open - Disney world stayed open
They didn’t mask up or mandate vaccination

They are no worse then California or New York

All while Florida has the Oldest Population of retirees living there

1. DeSantis suspending Dr. Raul Pino, the Orlando Dept of Health head for urging vaccination for his staff.
2.  Rep Randy Fine R53, Florida House (former gambling executive) introducing a bill to fine 11 Florida school districts $200m for mask mandates.

I’m so hooked now on getting daily sun to produce natural vitamin D protection that I get bummed out on cloudy days.

Thankfully, I’m in Florida so I’m good.

Florida Surgeon General Dr. Joseph Ladapo declined to disclose whether he has received a coronavirus vaccine during a contentious confirmation hearing where Democrats pressed the state’s top doctor to promote the shots
